reviews.text: Great food and service! I would totally recommend this place to a friend or anybody who is looking for authentic Chinese food!

Ordered: curry chicken with fried rice (add eggs and bean sprouts), chicken wings, vegetable egg roll, and crab rangoon.

The good:
The chicken curry was...
Food was decent. Ordered a few items for pickup. The phoenix and dragon entree, won ton soup and fresh Vietnamese spring rolls. Phoenix and dragon was good...
